welcome.title: Thank you for using {{COM:bot.name}}!
description: {{REF:bot.description}}

helpContactSupport.title: Help - {{REF:helpOptions.contactSupport}}
description: Have a question or feedback? Join our support server at the link below!

fields.name: Commands
value: To see the available commands, just type `/` and select the bot from the left side. You can then scroll through all available commands. Some commands may be hidden if you don't have permission to view them.

fields.name: Command Permissions
value: Want to restrict commands to certain roles, users, or channels? Set up permissions in the bot's integration page by going to **Server Settings** > **Integrations**, and then **Manage** for this bot.

rules.title: Welcome to {{COM:bot.name}}!
description: Thank you for using {{COM:bot.name}}! To get started, you need to accept the bot's rules and guidelines. Please read the following information carefully.
Rules and Guidelines:
1. Please do not abuse the messaging system. Moderation is light, but we strictly prohibit extreme content such as violence, hate speech, pedophilia, or any other extreme topics.
2. We are strict about attachments. No NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content is tolerated. Any user found sharing such content will be banned immediately.
3. Do not share personal information. Protect your privacy and that of others by not disclosing sensitive data such as addresses, phone numbers, or login credentials.
4. If you notice any violations of the rules, please report them to the moderation team using the report button.
5. Spamming, advertising, or posting messages unrelated to a confession is not allowed.
By continuing to use {{COM:bot.name}}, you agree to these rules and guidelines.

rules-accepted.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Rules Accepted
description:
You have accepted the rules and guidelines, you are now free to use the bot's features.
Please use the command again to start using the bot.

rules-decline.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Rules Declined
description:
You have declined the rules and guidelines, you will not be able to use the bot's features.
Please use the command again to accept the rules and start using the bot.

confession-type.title: Choose your confession type
description: How would you like to submit your confession?
üåç **Global Confession**: Your confession will be visible to everyone on Discord. It remains completely anonymous and includes likes, reactions, and other engagement features.

üë• **Guild-Only Confession**: Your confession will only be visible within the current guild. It does not include likes or reactions, only attachments. The message will be **immediately posted in the current channel**.
Please select the type of confession you want to make.

confession-lang.title: {{TYPE}} | Choose your confession language
description: üí¨ Before submitting your confession, please choose the language you wish to use.

confession-cancel.title: Confession Cancelled
description: You have cancelled the confession process. If you would like to submit a confession, please use the command again.

confession-write.title: Write your confession
description:
*Ô∏è‚É£ Type: {{TYPE}}
 *Ô∏è‚É£ Language: {{LANGUAGE}}
üìù Please write your confession below. **You can include images, videos, audios after the writing.**

confession-theme.title: Choose your confession theme
description: üé® **Theme**: Choose a theme for your confession. This will help others find your confession and engage with it.
Please select the theme you want to use.

confession-content.title: Confession Content
description: üìù **Content**: {{CONTENT}}

confesson-detected-spam.title: Spam Detected
description:
‚õî Your confession contains spam and cannot be submitted. Please edit your confession and try again.

**Reasons:** ${{REASONS}}

confession-vulgar-content.title: Vulgar Content Detected
description: :warning: Your confession has been detected as excessively vulgar and cannot be submitted. We don't want to limit your expression, and vulgar language is allowed, but this particular message is too extreme. Please edit your confession and try again.

confession-review.title: Review your confession
description: *Ô∏è‚É£ **Type**: {{TYPE}}
üé® **Theme**: {{THEME}} {{THEME_EMOJI}}
üåê **Language**: {{LANGUAGE}} {{LANGUAGE_FLAG}}
Please review your confession before submitting it.

confession-sent.title: Confession Sent
description: Your confession has been sent successfully!

translate.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Translations
translate.description: Thank you to our translators who have made it possible for {{COM:bot.name}} to be used in the following languages. If you are interested in providing a translation, please contact the staff in our [support server]({{COM:links.support}}).

cooldownHit.description: You can only run this command {{AMOUNT}} time(s) every {{INTERVAL}}. Please wait before attempting this command again.

devOnly.description: This action can only be done by developers.

description: I don't have all permissions required to run that command here! Please check the server and channel permissions to make sure I have the following permissions.
Required permissions: {{PERMISSIONS}}

startupInProcess.description: {{COM:bot.name}} is still starting up. Try again later.

notImplemented.description: This feature has not been implemented yet!

confession-other-messages.masked: ‚ùó Your confession contains sensitive data and has been masked. Please don't include any sensitive data in your confession.
confession-other-messages.other-languages:
**üåê Your confession has been detected as being in {{DLFULLNAME}} {{DLFLAG}}.**
If you want to use this language, click the button below. Otherwise, you can continue with {{SLFULLNAME}} {{SLFLAG}}.

bot.description: {{REF:links.templateEmbed}} helps give developers a starting point for new Discord bots, so that much of the initial setup can be avoided and developers can instead focus on meaningful bot features.

commandDescs.confession: Confess your sins, secrets or anything else you want to get off your chest.
